Penhaligon is claiming that the partially damaged stock are not fit for selling to clients and taking into consideration that 10 months have passed from the time of the claim, I doubt anything is in selling condition.

 

In order to close this claim, I propose to close the claim as follows:

•            Fully damaged stock:                                                     AED 14,666

•            Partially damaged stock:                                               AED   5,472

•            Reduction for partial damage (10%):                           (AED 547.20)

•            Value lost:                                                                           AED 19,590.80

•            Less: Applicable policy deductible (10%):                         (AED 1,959)

•            Proposed Net Settlement by the insurer:                           AED 17,631.72

For the sake of good order, all items will be destroyed with photographic evidence as proof, if not already destroyed. 

 

I am proposing a slight reduction from the partially damaged items even though the products will be destroyed in order to facilitate closure of the claim.

Appreciate your support and I look forward to your response to conclude the claim.

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Penhaligon is claiming that the partially damaged stock are not fit for selling to clients and taking into consideration that 10 months have passed from the time of the claim, I doubt anything is in selling condition.

 

In order to close this claim, I propose to close the claim as follows:

•            Fully damaged stock:                                                     AED 14,666

•            Partially damaged stock:                                               AED   5,472

•            Reduction for partial damage (10%):                           (AED 547.20)

•            Value lost:                                                                           AED 19,590.80

•            Less: Applicable policy deductible (10%):                         (AED 1,959)

•            Proposed Net Settlement by the insurer:                           AED 17,631.72

For the sake of good order, all items will be destroyed with photographic evidence as proof, if not already destroyed. 

 

I am proposing a slight reduction from the partially damaged items even though the products will be destroyed in order to facilitate closure of the claim.

Appreciate your support and I look forward to your response to conclude the claim.

Thank You & Best Regards,

Hagop

 

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

Subject: RE: Stock room damaged items

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Kirk,

 

Hope all is well and apologies for any delays.

Penhaligon is claiming that the partially damaged stock are not fit for selling to clients and taking into consideration that 10 months have passed from the time of the claim, I doubt anything is in selling condition.

 

In order to close this claim, I propose to close the claim as follows:

•            Fully damaged stock:                                                     AED 14,666

•            Partially damaged stock:                                               AED   5,472

•            Reduction for partial damage (10%):                           (AED 547.20)

•            Value lost:                                                                           AED 19,590.80

•            Less: Applicable policy deductible (10%):                         (AED 1,959)

•            Proposed Net Settlement by the insurer:                           AED 17,631.72

Hagop

Dear Kirk,

 

Hope all is well and apologies for any delays.

Penhaligon is claiming that the partially damaged stock are not fit for selling to clients and taking into consideration that 10 months have passed from the time of the claim, I doubt anything is in selling condition.

 

In order to close this claim, I propose to close the claim as follows:

•            Fully damaged stock:                                                     AED 14,666

•            Partially damaged stock:                                               AED   5,472

•            Reduction for partial damage (10%):                           (AED 547.20)

•            Value lost:                                                                           AED 19,590.80

•            Less: Applicable policy deductible (10%):                         (AED 1,959)

•            Proposed Net Settlement by the insurer:                           AED 17,631.72

	On 7 Mar 2024, at 12:23, Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> > wrote:

	﻿ 

	Dear Sayed,

	 

	The claim has been intimated and is in progress.

Dear Kirk,

 

Hope all is well and apologies for any delays.

Penhaligon is claiming that the partially damaged stock are not fit for selling to clients and taking into consideration that 10 months have passed from the time of the claim, I doubt anything is in selling condition.

 

In order to close this claim, I propose to close the claim as follows:
